original: @47b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @47b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: tsitta kalpa pa ri ha ra drishti n'a ma /
analyzed: tsitta kalpa pa ri ha ra drishti n'a ma /
translated: Cittakalpaparihara-dristi-nama

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: sems nyid kyi rtog pa 'joms pa'i lta ba zhes bya ba /
analyzed: sems nyid kyi rtog pa 'joms pa'i lta ba zhes bya ba /
translated: The View That Destroys the Concepts of Mind-Itself, Called The View That Destroys the Concepts of Mind-Itself

original: gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽mar sar mgo bo bcad ba yis //
analyzed: gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo // mar sar mgo bo bcad ba yis //
translated: Homage to Yamantaka!🔽By cutting off the head of the butter-lamp

original: sta re'i so ni 'chag par byed //
analyzed: sta re'i so ni 'chag par byed //
translated: The edge of the knife is blunted.

original: sbal pas glang po mid par 'gyur //
analyzed: sbal pas glang po mid par 'gyur //
translated: The frog swallows the elephant.

original: kye ma shing thun dgod par byed //
analyzed: kye ma shing thun dgod par byed //
translated: Oh! The woodcutter laughs.

original: kye ma ngo mtshar me go kye //
analyzed: kye ma ngo mtshar me go kye //
translated: Oh! The wonder of it!🔽Do not doubt the mind.

original: sems la the tshom ma byed cig / mtshar na aa ba dh'u t'i pa //
analyzed: sems la the tshom ma byed cig / mtshar na aa ba dh'u t'i pa //
translated: If it is wonderful, it is the avadhuti

original: sems la rtog pa ma byed cig /
analyzed: sems la rtog pa ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the mind.🔽He did not explain it, I did not understand.

original: kho yis ma bshad 'di ma go / nam mkha' las ni me tog 'byung //
analyzed: kho yis ma bshad 'di ma go / nam mkha' las ni me tog 'byung //
translated: Flowers come from the sky.

original: kye ma ngo mtshar me go kye //
analyzed: kye ma ngo mtshar me go kye //
translated: Oh! The wonder of it!🔽Do not doubt the mind.

original: sems la the tshom ma byed cig / mtshar na aa ba dh'u t'i pa //
analyzed: sems la the tshom ma byed cig / mtshar na aa ba dh'u t'i pa //
translated: If it is wonderful, it is the avadhuti

original: sems kyi the tshom ci zhig bya //
analyzed: sems kyi the tshom ci zhig bya //
translated: What doubt is there in the mind?

original: kye ma mo gsham bu skyes na //
analyzed: kye ma mo gsham bu skyes na //
translated: Oh! When the son of a barren woman is born

original: khri yang gar ni byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: khri yang gar ni byed par 'gyur //
translated: The throne also dances.

original: ras bal dkon par thob 'gyur bas //
analyzed: ras bal dkon par thob 'gyur bas //
translated: Cotton is obtained as a rarity

original: nam mkha'i gos can du bar byed //
analyzed: nam mkha'i gos can du bar byed //
translated: The one who is clothed in the sky is amazed.

original: kye ma ngo mtshar me go kye //
analyzed: kye ma ngo mtshar me go kye //
translated: Oh, how amazing!

original: sems kyi the tshom ci zhig bya //
analyzed: sems kyi the tshom ci zhig bya //
translated: What doubt is there in the mind?

original: mtshar na aa ba dh'u t'i pa //
analyzed: mtshar na aa ba dh'u t'i pa //
translated: If it is amazing, it is in the avadhūti🔽Do not have doubt in the mind.🔽Oh, how amazing!

original: sems la the tshom ma byed cig / kye ma glang chen khri la 'dug / sbrang bu gnyis kyis 'degs par byed //
analyzed: sems la the tshom ma byed cig / kye ma glang chen khri la 'dug / sbrang bu gnyis kyis 'degs par byed //
translated: Two ants lift up a thousand-ton elephant.

original: dmus long lam ston ngo mtshar @48a * //
analyzed: dmus long lam ston ngo mtshar @48a * //
translated: A blind man gives directions—how amazing!

original: che // lkugs pas gtam ni smra bar byed //
analyzed: che // lkugs pas gtam ni smra bar byed //
translated: A mute speaks.

original: kye ma ngo mtshar me go kye //
analyzed: kye ma ngo mtshar me go kye //
translated: Oh, how amazing!

original: sems la the tshom ma byed cig / mtshar na aa ba dh'u t'i pa //
analyzed: sems la the tshom ma byed cig / mtshar na aa ba dh'u t'i pa //
translated: Do not have doubt in the mind.🔽If it is amazing, it is in the avadhūti.

original: sems kyi the tshom ci zhig bya //
analyzed: sems kyi the tshom ci zhig bya //
translated: What doubt is there in the mind?

original: byi bas byi la 'ded pa mtshar //
analyzed: byi bas byi la 'ded pa mtshar //
translated: A mouse chases a cat—how amazing!

original: de mthong ngo mtshar skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de mthong ngo mtshar skye bar 'gyur //
translated: When that is seen, amazement arises.

original: bong bu myos pa mthong 'gyur bas //
analyzed: bong bu myos pa mthong 'gyur bas //
translated: When a crazy donkey is seen,

original: glang po rnams kyang bros par byed //
analyzed: glang po rnams kyang bros par byed //
translated: even elephants run away.

original: kye ma ngo mtshar me go kye //
analyzed: kye ma ngo mtshar me go kye //
translated: Oh, how amazing!

original: sems la the tshom ma byed cig / mtshar na aa wa dh'u t'i pa //
analyzed: sems la the tshom ma byed cig / mtshar na aa wa dh'u t'i pa //
translated: Do not have doubt in the mind.🔽If it is amazing, it is in the avadhūti.

original: sems kyi the tshom ci zhig bya //
analyzed: sems kyi the tshom ci zhig bya //
translated: What doubt is there in the mind?

original: kye ma spre'u ltogs pa ni //
analyzed: kye ma spre'u ltogs pa ni //
translated: Alas, a hungry monkey

original: rdo ba kham gyis za bar byed //
analyzed: rdo ba kham gyis za bar byed //
translated: chews on a stone.

original: kye ma sems kyi nyams myong ni //
analyzed: kye ma sems kyi nyams myong ni //
translated: Alas, the experience of the mind

original: sus kyang brjod par nus ma yin //
analyzed: sus kyang brjod par nus ma yin //
translated: cannot be expressed by anyone.

original: kye ma ngo mtshar me go kye //🔽sems la the tshom ma byed cig / mtshar na aa wa dh'u t'i pa //
analyzed: kye ma ngo mtshar me go kye // sems la the tshom ma byed cig / mtshar na aa wa dh'u t'i pa //
translated: Alas, how wondrous!🔽Do not doubt the mind.🔽If it is wondrous, what doubt is there in the mind

original: sems kyi the tshom ci zhig bya //
analyzed: sems kyi the tshom ci zhig bya //
translated: in the avadhūtī?

original: sems nyid kyi rtog pa 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba kam ka la dang me kha la nas brgyud pa slob dpon la ksha m'i yis gsungs pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: sems nyid kyi rtog pa 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba kam ka la dang me kha la nas brgyud pa slob dpon la ksha m'i yis gsungs pa rdzogs so//
translated: The one called “The Conqueror of the Concepts of Mind” was spoken by the master Lakṣmī, who was in the lineage from Kamkarṇa and Mekhala.
